attributes.action: Stop holiday companies increasing their prices during school holidays.
attributes.additional_details:
I have chosen Centre Parcs as an example because their holidays during school holidays can rise in price as much as £1000!
I want the big holidays to make a stand and provide holidays for all budgets so our children can enjoy holidays and not be left out.
attributes.background:
I am a parent to 3 young children and as such can only holiday during the school holidays.
We live on a budget as many people do and just can't afford to take a holiday in this country.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about the price of holidays in the school holidays, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could ask Parliament to change the law, to make it illegal for holiday companies to increase their prices during school holidays.
